procedure: [09– Cent.Elect.][Coding - 07][Dropdown] x ** 8 K1 955 119 ** WWS xxxx Long Coding Helper - > Byte 1 Bit 3 - Remove check mark(1 = active)
[09 – Cent. Elect.] [Coding - 07] Long Coding Helper Byte 10 Submodule 0 Bit 3 - Set to 0 to disable amber side markers(U.S.vehicles)
[46 – Central Conv.] [Coding - 07] Long Coding Helper Byte 9 Bit 7set to 0(Uncheck)
[09– Cent.Elect.] [Coding - 07] Long Coding Helper Byte 3 Bit 2 - LEDs remain at full brightness with parking lights(1 = active) Bit 7 - Turn off LED - strip DRLs with indicators(1 = active
[09 – Cent. Elect.] [Coding - 07] Long Coding Helper Byte 5 Bit 3 - Set to 0 to disable "lights are on" warning when you open the door.

description: Disable NAV & Phone warning messages while entering data at speed
procedure: [5F - Information Electr.] Adaptation Set channel 2 & 3 to 250
[17 - Instruments] [Coding - 07] Long Coding Helper Byte 0 Bit 2 - 4– Seat Belt Warning inactive
